summary:
This year I've migrated to Linux for my primary computer-ing, but I've yet to find any apps I feel particularly strong about.  Most things are web apps anyway, so it doesn't matter too much. 

🤖 Automation: Apple Shortcuts, Superkey, Rectangle Pro
🗄️ Backup: Backblaze
🔖 Bookmarks: Linkding
🌐 Browser: Safari, Vivaldi
📆 Calendar: Fantastical
📷 Camera App: Obscura
💬 Chat: iMessage, TheLounge
🌩️ Cloud Storage: iCloud Drive, OneDrive, Nextcloud
📇 Contacts: iCloud Contacts
👩‍💻 Editor: VS Code†, Nova
🖋️ Illustration: Affinity Designer, Dotgrid
🚀 Launcher: Raycast†
📨 Mail Client: Apple Mail, iCloud Mail
🏣 Mail Server: iCloud Mail
🐘 Mastodon: Mona, Phanpy
🎞️ Media Tracking: Last...
title: Default Apps

summary:
I have been searching for something that would give me a quick view of ALL of my containers in a simple dashboard and give me the ability to do a few things like search for specific containers quickly, see IP addresses, volume mounts, networks, uptime, etc.  I didn’t really find anything that suited my purposes.  …

title: Docker Dashboard: New Tool Let’s You See Containers Across Multiple Hosts

summary:
